title: Border, early 18th century
dimensions:
H x W: 6.5 x 114 cm (2 9/16 x 44 7/8 in.)
Repeat H: 53.3 cm (21 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point de Venise à Réseau in a design of asymmetric floral and foliated sprays rising from urn-shaped forms in an inverted repeat pattern. Fond: diamond diaper. Modes: réseau mouché, gaze quadrillée, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, early 18th century.
early 18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-70.
